QuestData.Title: Protecting the Shipment
QuestData.Description: We need to get this powder to Ironband, but this cart isn't going anywhere now. It'll be a lot for us to carry, and these parts can get dangerous -- and who knows what else the Dark Irons might have in store for us now that Saean is with them.$b$bI'll feel a lot better if you helped me watch over things. Miran can offload the powder kegs at camp while you and I protect the cart.
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect Huldar and the Ironband Caravan, and then inform Prospector Ironband.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Prospector Ironband at Ironband's Excavation Site in Loch Modan.
QuestData.RewardText: It is troubling news that you bring. To think that the Dark Irons have sympathizers able to procure this sort of material for their dastardly plans.$b$bThat's a matter for someone else to consider, some other time. Thank you for protecting Huldar and the cart!
